    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Es diu en anglès "I have eight years old?"</string>
            <string language="en">Do you say "I have eight years old" in English?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sagen Sie "mich, acht Jahre alt" auf englisch zu 
haben?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Me dites-vous "avoir huit ans de " en anglais ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você diz-me "para ter oito anos velho" em 
inglês?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo dite "avere vecchio otto anni" in inglese?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λέτε ότι "εγώ έχει οκτώ ετών" στα αγγλικά;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR). S'hi resol el dubte de com dir l'edat en anglès, tot solucionant possibles errades gramaticals per interferència del català.
Ofereix la possibilitat d'impressió.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on how to say your age in English, taking into account grammatical interference from Catalan. It includes a print option.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">competència comunicativa</string>
            <string language="en">communicative competence</string>
            <string language="es">competencia comunicativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf, wie man Ihr
Alter auf englisch sagt und in Betracht grammatische Störung vom 
katalanische zieht. Es schließt eine Druckoption ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la façon dont dire 
votre âge en anglais, en tenant compte de l'interférence 
grammaticale du catalan. Il inclut une option d'impression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) em como dizer sua idade em 
inglês, fazendo exame na interferência gramatical do cliente do 
catalan. Inclui uma opção da cópia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) su come dire la vostra età in 
inglese, considerando l'interferenza grammaticale da catalan. 
Include un'opzione della stampa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στο πώς να πει την ηλικία σας
στα αγγλικά, που λαμβάνουν υπόψη τη γραμματική παρέμβαση από τα 
καταλανικά. Περιλαμβάνει μια προαιρετική δυνατότητα 
τυπωμένων υλών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">mitteilsame Kompetenz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compétence communicative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">competence communicative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">competenza comunicativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επικοινωνιακή ικανότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
